title: Title is required and must be a string.
desc: Description is required and must be a string.
locationLatFloat: Latitude must be a float between -90 and 90.
locationLngFloat: Longitude must be a float between -180 and 180.
address: Address is required and must be a string.
creatives: Creatives are required and must be an array with at least one element.
creativesCategory: Category ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
creativesUsers: Users are required for each creative and must be an array with at least one element.
creativesUsersUser: User ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
creativesUsersDuration: Duration must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
creativesUsersStartDate: Start date must be a valid ISO 8601 date.
creativesUsersWorkHours: Work hours must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
creativesUsersHourPrice: Hour price must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
teamId: Team ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
user: User ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
duration: Duration must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
startDate: Start date must be a valid ISO 8601 date.
workHours: Work hours must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
hourPrice: Hour price must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
category: Category ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
searchKeywords: Search keywords must be an array.
maxBudget: Max budget must be a numeric value.
minBudget: Min budget must be a numeric value.
creative: Creative ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
isDeleted: IsDeleted must be a boolean value.
limit: Limit must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
page: Page must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
